name: jcv-claude-code-plugins
description: Collection of Claude Code plugins: UI improvement automation, feature development workflow, voice notifications, and business advisor

plugins.name: ui-improve-loop
plugins.description: Iterative UI improvement loop using UIReview and Chrome automation. Automatically improves your UI until it reaches a target quality score.

plugins.name: dev-workflow
plugins.description: Feature development workflow orchestrating specialized agents: Idea Refiner, Spec Writer, Task Planner, Implementer, E2E Tester, and Reviewer

plugins.name: voice-notifications
plugins.description: Notificaciones de voz contextuales en español usando Chatterbox TTS cuando Claude completa tareas o requiere atención

plugins.name: business-advisor
plugins.description: Consultor de negocios integrado con tu codebase - valida ideas, prioriza features, planifica lanzamientos, investiga mercados, análisis financiero, pricing y user personas
